dcterms:creator: Chenhao Tan

dcterms:description: A dataset collected from the ChangeMyView subreddit, consisting of original posts and corresponding replies, where replies are labeled as positive if they change the original poster's mind and negative otherwise.
dcterms:title: ChangeMyView subreddit (CMV)

dcterms:description: A self-constructed dataset for extracting interactive argument pairs from original posts and replies, annotated by human annotators.
dcterms:title: Self-constructed dataset for interactive argument pair extraction
